Keen IO | San Antonio, TX | Solutions Architect | Full-time | ONSITE | https://keen.io

We acquired Keen last December and have been carefully growing the team and getting the product in shape since then. We started with ramping up engineering over the spring/summer and we just finished staffing up our CS org. We've got enough organic demand that a Solutions Architect is our next critical hire (our chief platform engineer and I have been splitting that work but its definitely a full time job at this point).

At Keen the Solutions Architect role is a bit different. Its a highly technical role and you work both pre-sales and on post sale implementation. Our analytics platform provides general purpose building blocks to solve a wide variety of challenges, we rely heavily on discovery and a deep level of analytics expertise to help our customers assemble exactly the solution they need.

What we’re looking for: - Experience in either a Sales or Customer facing engineering role. - Solid understanding of SQL or NoSQL concepts and implementations. - Technical background working with modern web technologies, stacks, and API’s.

You should have some familiarity with one or more of the following: Javascript, Ruby, Node, or Python, etc.

Ultimately, what we’re looking for is someone with familiarity implementing business or product performance analytics ( activation, engagement, retention, adoption), and that can help other companies use our platform to implement similar metrics and data models.

https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/scaleworkscom/view/P...

If you've got any questions shoot me an email (florian.hines@keen.io).
